conbody.draft-comment: THIS SHOULD HAVE A GENERAL SHORT DESCRIPTION.
Applicability: For devices that incorporate “legal for Trade” instruments or with scale functionality (NAWI).
conbody.p: Applicability: For devices that incorporate “legal for Trade” weighing or measurement instruments. For devices that incorporate a ‘Legal for Trade’ weighing or measuring instrument, Weights & Measures regulations place responsibility of DEVICE OWNER to notify their local Weight & Measures Authority and follow any Placing-in-Trade requirements. These steps must be done prior to using the device to perform measurement based financial transactions. More information can be found at zebra.com/weights-measures.
